channel.title: Compatibility Question
channel.description: On the home page there is a question that reads, "What will I need in order to play?" Followed by the explanation that one must have a game featuring the source engine. I recently bought Half-Life: Source, and I was wondering if that would apply as one of those games, even though the "detailed list" did not list it?

item.title: Compatibility Question
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Half-Life: Source is not one of the games that has the Source SDK, therefore, no.

Go by the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Compatibility Question
item.dc:creator: Matoking
item.description:
If you can install Source SDK (found from Tools in Steam), then yes, you can play it.

Read full topic
